summary: A rowdy woman is so forceful that she outdoes her husband in a loud cry against speculators who refuse poor people entrance to a block of new apartments, built after WW2. Without noticing ... See full summary Â»
cast: Anna Magnani|Nando Bruno|Ave Ninchi|Ernesto Almirante|Agnese Dubbini|Armando Migliari|Maria Donati|Maria Grazia Francia|Vittorio Mottini|Franco Zeffirelli|Gianni Musy|Ughetto Bertucci|Anita Angius|Aristide Baghetti|Gino Cavalieri|Adalberto Tenaglia|Ciccio Barbi|Ciro Berardi|Diego Calcagno|Aldo De Franchi|Olga Vittoria Gentilli|Felice Minotti|Egle Monti|Olga Solbelli|Attilio Torelli|Marco Tulli|Aldo Vasco
title: Noble gesta
